news: On the 10th of October 2024, infamous user 'ILoveVesna' had their dark past and true identity revealed. The man we once thought to be an innocent pinoy fillipino had turned out to be a Foodist BMT Advocate. Admins pull up multiple evidence confirming this, but suspiciously took a long time to do anything about it, as the posts confirming the truth were from months ago.
